p: The changing dynamics of the disease as it continues to emerge could also affect the development of vaccines when trial designs are informed by the epidemiology of the virus. As governments implement lockdowns and nonessential travel and transmission rates decline, clinical trial recruitment will become challenging across the potentially dozens of independent clinical programs striving for patients and healthy volunteers. In addition, patient screening for COVID-19-negative status and monitoring of potential virus exposure while on study will create additional challenges and opportunities for early trial endpoints.
